Smyrna Forensic Economist

Trusted expert economic analysis and litigation support for Smyrna's experienced law firms. Providing comprehensive forensic economics services with precision, integrity, and courtroom-tested expertise.

Court-Qualified Expert Smyrna Metro Area Fast Turnaround Detailed Reports

Smyrna's legal community deserves forensic economic analysis that stands up to the most rigorous courtroom scrutiny. At Skerritt Economics, we provide comprehensive economic damage calculations, business valuations, and expert testimony services specifically tailored for the unique demands of Georgia litigation.

Our practice serves attorneys throughout the Smyrna area with meticulous attention to detail, industry-experienced methodologies, and clear, compelling expert reports that help you build winning cases for your clients.

Personal Injury & Wrongful Death

Comprehensive lost earnings analysis, life care planning, and household services valuations. Our calculations incorporate Smyrna's specific wage patterns, cost of living adjustments, and career trajectory modeling for accurate damage assessments.

Medical Malpractice

Expert life care planning and medical cost projections for catastrophic injury cases. We work closely with Smyrna's comprehensive medical institutions to provide detailed, defensible economic analysis for complex malpractice litigation.

Employment Litigation

Precise wage loss calculations, discrimination damage analysis, and career impact assessments. Our expertise covers Smyrna's diverse employment landscape from transportation & logistics and technology & software to healthcare & life sciences and manufacturing.

Business Valuation

Professional business valuations for commercial disputes, partnership dissolutions, and divorce proceedings. We understand Smyrna's dynamic business environment and provide valuations that reflect current market realities.

Get expert economic analysis for your case. Free initial consultation available for qualifying matters.
